articles.title: Watch Canada's short track speed skaters compete at Beijing 2022 | CBC Sports
articles.description: Watch live coverage of Olympic short track speed skating at the Beijing 2022 Olympic Winter Games. Live action from Capital Indoor Stadium includes the quarter-finals, semifinals and finals of the men's 1,500-metres.
articles.content:
Click on the video player above beginning on Wednesday at 6 a.m. ET to watch live coverage of Olympic short track speed skating at the Beijing 2022 Olympic Winter Games.

articles.title: Canada's Meryeta O'Dine rides to bronze in women's snowboard cross | CBC Sports
articles.description: Meryeta O'Dine won the first Olympic medal of her career, capturing bronze in the women's snowboard cross competition.
articles.content: Meryeta O'Dine of Prince George, B.C., won the first Olympic medal of her career, capturing bronze in the women's snowboard cross competition, sharing the podium with gold-medal winner Lindsey Jacobe… [+2891 chars]

articles.title: Canada in line for possible upgrade to podium in Olympic team figure skating | CBC Sports
articles.description: An ongoing legal issue involving the medallists in the team figure skating competition at the Beijing Olympics has caused the award ceremony to be delayed, the International Olympic Committee said Wednesday.
